TopicTitle: Recommendation: Include savegames in the bug report

Articles.Content:
Recommendation: Make it possible that you can upload the game state files and vehicle files in the bug report via the launcher and not only images.

Matt Lowne also says in his videos that he can submit the LOG data and his save data.

Maybe the development team can crush the reported bugs faster.
You can attach your files in your report on private division site feedback
